CustomField.description: CASE( Improvement_Priority__c , "Not Acknowledged", 1, "Acknowledged Low",2, "Moderate Importance",3,"High Importance",4,"Critical for Success",5,0)
CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL( aecm__Improvement_Priority__c , "Not Acknowledged")), 1, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Improvement_Priority__c, "Acknowledged Low")), 2, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Improvement_Priority__c, "Moderate Importance")), 3, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Improvement_Priority__c, "High Importance")), 4, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Improvement_Priority__c, "Critical for Success")), 5, 0 )))))
/* original formula CASE( Improvement_Priority__c , "Not Acknowledged", 1, "Acknowledged Low",2, "Moderate Importance",3,"High Importance",4,"Critical for Success",5,0)*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: based on the value selected in the picklist field "Improvement Priority". Not Acknowledged = 1, Acknowledged Low = 2, Moderate Importance = 3,High Importance = 4,Critical for Success = 5 and the default is 0
CustomField.label: Improvement Priority Score
